strings.Value: "Now that there are fewer of us, it's so... cold. So empty. I don't want to talk."
"I don't know how I'll write today. I don't want to write about death at all!"
"The dead live on in stories of the living. And if you have nothing good to say about the dead... they don't deserve us missing them!"
"Patience. It's hard to get used to it... but it's easier if you don't talk about it."
"Don't force yourself to speak, if you've nothing to say. Let us instead just sit in silence."
"'I fear I'm going to cry.' Just brush it off, child... the same lot awaits you all."
